price: Wakasema: Mchomeni moto, na muinusuru miungu yenu, ikiwa nyinyi ni watendao jambo!
arabic: قَالُواْ حَرِّقُوهُ وَٱنصُرُوٓاْ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ
footnotes: Wakaambiana wenyewe kwa wenyewe: Mchomeni moto mpate kuinusuru miungu yenu kwa mateso haya, ikiwa nyinyi mnataka kufanya kitu cha kuiunusuru miungu yenu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qālū ḥarriqūhu wa-unṣurū ālihatakum in kuntum fāʿilīna
